description: When attempting to sort a list of strings, a runtime error is encountered. The error occurs when the sorting algorithm attempts to compare two strings of different lengths, resulting in an "Index out of bounds" error.
code:

# List of strings to be sorted
list_str = ["apple", "banana", "cherry", "orange"]

# Function to sort list of strings
